00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_BRUSH_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_BRUSH_H_
00031 
00032 #include "mimas/mimas.h"
00033 #include "mimas/Color.h"
00034 #include <QtGui/QBrush>
00035 
00036 #include <iostream>
00037 
00038 namespace mimas {
00039 
00043 class Brush : public QBrush
00044 {
00045 public:
00046   Brush() : QBrush(Qt::NoBrush) {
00047     MIMAS_DEBUG_GX("Brush")
00048   }
00049 
00050   Brush(const Color &color, int style = Qt::SolidPattern) : QBrush(color, (Qt::BrushStyle)style) {
00051     MIMAS_DEBUG_GX("Brush")
00052   }
00053 
00054   Brush(float h, float s=1.0, float v=1.0, float a=1.0, int style = Qt::SolidPattern) : QBrush(Color(h, s, v, a), (Qt::BrushStyle)style) {
00055     MIMAS_DEBUG_GX("Brush")
00056   }
00057 
00058   ~Brush() {
00059     MIMAS_DEBUG_GX("~Brush")
00060   }
00061 
00062   void setStyle(int style) {
00063     QBrush::setStyle((Qt::BrushStyle)style);
00064   }
00065 
00066   void setColor(const Color &color) {
00067     QBrush::setColor(color);
00068   }
00069 };
00070 
00071 } // mimas
00072 #endif // LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_BRUSH_H_
